talk.schedule: The talk {{ talk.name }} is schedule at {{ talk.start | amDateFormat: 'HH:mm' }}.
talk.room: The talk {{ talk.name }} is scheduled in the room {{ talk.room}}.
talk.speakers:
The talk {{ talk.name }} is presented by:
{{ talk.speakers.join('
') }}.

error.no-talk-identified:
I can't identified a talk based on the sentence :

{{ expression }}

talk.none:
I don't know what to do with the expression:

{{ expression }}
